p: A CT-based AI system could also assist in early diagnosis for triage, monitoring, and treatment, as well as in establishing a reference for longitudinal follow-up [74]. Since CT scanning provides more detailed information on pathology and gives a better quantitative measurement of the lesionâ€™s size and the extent or severity of lung involvement, it may be a preferred tool, especially for point-of-care testing. The rapid turnaround time of CT assessment, coupled with the application of an AI system, may help in the early triage of patients by significantly shortening the duration from clinical inspection to triage, especially when the healthcare system is overloaded [75], [76].
